entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow early in the evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
